grains.title: Grains
grains.openWithWhichIdentity: With which of your identities would you like to open this grains?
grains.inTrash: This grain is in your trash. You cannot access it unless you restore it to your main list.
grains.removedByOwner: You can no longer access this grain because its owner has moved it to the trash.
grains.ownerSuspended: You can no longer access this grain because its owner's account has been suspended.
grains.restricted: Access through this URL is restricted to the identity:
grains.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to access this grain.
grains.warnIdentityRevealing: Requesting access will reveal your identity to the grain owner.
grains.waitForApproving: Your request has been sent. You will receive an email if your request is approved.
grains.signInPlease: Please sign in to request access.
grains.linkRevoked: Sorry, this link has been revoked.

backupPopup.title: Download Backup
backupPopup.warning: Warning! Restoring this backup might not work how you expect it to.

apiTokenPopup.title: Webkeys
apiTokenPopup.copyForExternalApp: Copy this webkey and give it to the external app:
apiTokenPopup.description: A webkey allows you to connect an external app (e.g. a mobile app) to this app.

whoHasAccessPopup.title: Who has access
whoHasAccessPopup.noLoggedInUsers: No logged-in users have visited your links yet.
whoHasAccessPopup.nobody: You have granted access to nobody.

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: Sharing emails cannot be sent while in demo mode. Create an account to send sharing emails, or get a shareable link instead.

grainSharePopup.oldSharingModelDescription: This grain uses the old sharing model. You can share it by copy/pasting the URL from the location bar
grainSharePopup.upgradeDescription: You can upgrade this grain to the new model, but anyone with whom you shared this grain previously will lose access; you will have to share with them again.
grainSharePopup.openInIncognitoMode: You are viewing this grain anonymously.
grainSharePopup.toShareAccess: To share access, copy this link:
grainSharePopup.openNonAnonymouslyHead: For more sharing options, you must
grainSharePopup.signIn: For more sharing options, please sign in.
